game.name: Leap Up no jutsu
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Leap Up No Jutsu is a simple casual game will help you to kill some time. Jump between two bamboo to void the falling spear.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Leap Up No Jutsu is a simple casual game will help you to kill some time. Jump between two bamboo to void the falling spear.

reviewHighlights.text: Basic AF, Annoying, Hard, Fun, Addictive. 7/10
